frontmatter.title: Customize Layout
frontmatter.meta_title: FluxStore - Universal mobile commerce Flutter app for Magento, WooCommerce and Opencart
frontmatter.meta_description: Fluxstore is universal app that fully integration with the Woocommerce, Mangeto and Opencart

markdownRemark.html:
Dynamic Tabbar

This is good feature config to change the tabbar icon, positions and default layout.

Open lib/common/config.json and edit the Tabbar value

"TabBar": [
    {
      "layout": "home",
      "icon": "assets/icons/tabs/icon-home.png"
    },
    {
      "layout": "category",
      "categoryLayout": "card",
      "icon": "assets/icons/tabs/icon-category.png"
    },
    {
      "layout": "search",
      "icon": "assets/icons/tabs/icon-search.png"
    },
    {
      "layout": "profile",
      "icon": "assets/icons/tabs/icon-user.png"
    }
  ]
  • layout: the screen layout, for the special home layout, it's dynamic layout that could control more flexible by update HorizonLayout, VerticalLayout, Background value (from the same config.json file)
  • icon: the asset file to load the tabbar icon image
  • categoryLayout: support many kind of category layout grid, column, sideMenu,

Home Layout

This section is used for the Fluxstore Pro/Woocommerce app.

Open lib/common/example/woocommerce/config_themeXX.json and copy the content to lib/common/config.json to get the demo as following screenshots:

Yes, itâ€™s quite easy to change your own design base on the powerful widget from the app. Try to make your own tuning Homepage.

Banner Slider Image

ðŸ—³ Coding Guide: widget file path: lib/widgets/home/banner/banner_slider_items.dart

ðŸ“– Usage: config as following option to enable the slider image.

  • layout: bannerImage
  • isSlider: true show the banner as slider.
  • items: is the array of json image objects. Each image can be linked to list of products by category ID.
	{
      "layout": "bannerImage",
      "isSlider": true,
      "items": [
        {
          "category": 21,
          "image": "https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1459805/59846818-12672e80-938b-11e9-8184-5f7bfe66f1a2.png",
          "padding": 15.0
        },
        {
          "category": 23,
          "image": "https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1459805/60091575-1f12ca80-976f-11e9-962c-bdccff60d143.png",
          "padding": 15.0
        },
        {
          "category": 21,
          "image": "https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1459805/60091808-a19b8a00-976f-11e9-9cc7-576ca05c2442.png",
          "padding": 15.0
        }
      ]
    }

Banner Group Image

ðŸ—³ Coding Guide: widget file path: lib/widgets/home/banner/banner_group_items.dart

ðŸ“– Usage: Support to show many images in the same row.

  • items: is the array of json image objects. Each image can be linked to list of products by category ID. If the items has only one image Object, it will show only one banner.
  • isSlider: false or it can be blank as below example.
	{ 
      "layout": "bannerImage",
      "items": [
        {
          "category": 37,
          "image": "https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1459805/59846823-12ffc500-938b-11e9-8d93-65ead3d6b1dd.png",
          "padding": 5.0
        },
        {
          "category": 38,
          "image": "https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1459805/59846824-12ffc500-938b-11e9-8d5a-fc42cb1b7658.png",
          "padding": 5.0
        }
      ]
    },

Logo Item

ðŸ—³ Coding Guide:

  • Widget file path: lib/widgets/home/index.dart, check the case "logo".
  • Edit the const kLogoImage = 'assets/images/logo.png' from lib/common/constant.dart to change the Logo.

ðŸ“– Usage: Support to the Logo file from homepage as optional, enable to add this object.

 	{
      "layout": "logo"
    },

Category List Icons

ðŸ—³ Coding Guide:

  • Widget file path: lib/widgets/home/category/category_icon_items.dart

  • Edit lib/common/config.json to enable list of available categories by customizing the ID and color. It's possible to change the heave gradient with white center icons:

    {
  "category": 22,
  "image": "assets/icons/categories/ic_dress.png",
  "colors": ["#3E6AB5", "#3E6AB5"],
},

ðŸ“– Usage: Support to show list of icons by adding this section to the lib/common/config.json file.

 	{
      "layout": "circleCategory"
    },

Product Card listing

ðŸ—³ Coding Guide: widget file path: lib/widgets/product/product_list.dart and lib/widgets/product/product_card_view.dart

ðŸ“– Usage: Support to show list of Products with flexible layout (Card, two or three columns) by adding this section to the lib/common/config.json file.

  • name: the name to display the card title.
  • layout: the supported layout should be threeColumns, twoColumns, card.
  • category: the category id of your website.
{
      "name": "Woman Collection",
      "layout": "threeColumn",
      "category": 27
},

Instagram items

ðŸ—³ Coding Guide:

  • Widget file path: lib/widgets/home/horizontal/instagram_items.dart
  • The widget depends on webview_flutter to display the detailed instagram page by webview, but the list image is native by Flutter widget.

ðŸ“– Usage: Support to show list of Instagram photos by the Tag config. This is very useful for displaying your existing photos from Instagram.

  • name: the title of the list.
  • layout: the name should be instagram.
  • tag: the tag name of your Instagram.
	{
      "name": "Share your look",
      "layout": "instagram",
      "tag": "fashionmodel"
    }

Metro Layout (staggered list)

{
  "layout": "staggered",
  "limit": 20,
  "category": 29
}

Simple ListView Layout

{
  "layout": "simpleVerticalListItems"
}

Four Columns Layout

{
  "layout": "fourColumn",
  "category": 209
},

Tinder Banner

{
  "layout": "bannerImage",
  "isSlider": true,
  "design": "tinder",
  "items": [
    {
      "category": 23,
      "image": "https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1459805/59846818-12672e80-938b-11e9-8184-5f7bfe66f1a2.png",
      "padding": 15.0
    }
  ]
},

Vertical Layout

"VerticalLayout": {
  "layout": "pinterest",
  "name": {
    "en": "Recent Collections",
    "ab": "Ù…Ø¬Ù…ÙˆØ¹Ø§Øª Ø§Ù„Ø±Ø¬Ù„",
    "vi": "Bá»™ sÆ°u táº­p gáº§n "
  }
},

The Layout values: pinterest, menu, card, columns, list, default.

Blog Detail Layout

Open lib/common/config.dart, in the kAdvanceConfig section, change the kBlogLayout config to one of following enums: { simpleType, fullSizeImageType, halfSizeImageType, oneQuarterImageType }.

const kAdvanceConfig = {
  "DetailedBlogLayout": kBlogLayout.halfSizeImageType
};

Category Layout

Open lib/common/config.json and change the TabBar section to one of following string values { card, sideMenu, column, subCategories, animation, grid}

  "TabBar": {
	...
    "Category": {
      "isDisplay": true,
      "layout": "card"
    },

Since the v1.5.7 this option is moved the json file to support for futher configuration from the FluxBuilder to configure the tabbar dynamically.

Drawer Layout (left menu side)

New Left menu side is now easier to navigate between the Shop and other menu items. The menu could be opened by swiping from left to right or trigger by this function Scafford.of(context).openDrawer().

To add new menu item, go to lib/tabbar.dart

drawer: Drawer(
    child: SingleChildScrollView(
        child: Column(
            children: <Widget>[
                DrawerHeader(
                    child: Row(
                        children: <Widget>[
                            Image.asset(kLogoImage, height: 38),
                        ],
                    ),
                    decoration: BoxDecoration(
                        color: Colors.white,
                    ),
                ),
                Padding(
                    padding: const EdgeInsets.only(left: 15.0),
                    child: Column(
                        children: <Widget>[
                            ListTile(
                                leading: Icon(
                                    Icons.shopping_basket,
                                    size: 20,
                                ),
                                title: Text(S.of(context).shop),
                                onTap: () {
                                    Navigator.pushReplacementNamed(context, "/home");
                                },
                            ),
                            ListTile(
                                leading: Icon(FontAwesomeIcons.wordpress, size: 20),
                                title: Text(S.of(context).blog),
                                onTap: () {
                                    Navigator.pushNamed(context, "/blogs");
                                },
                            ),
                            ListTile(
                                leading: Icon(FontAwesomeIcons.heart, size: 20),
                                title: Text(S.of(context).myWishList),
                                onTap: () {
                                    Navigator.pushNamed(context, "/wishlist");
                                },
                            ),
                            ListTile(
                                leading: Icon(Icons.exit_to_app, size: 20),
                                title: loggedIn
                                ? Text(S.of(context).logout)
                                : Text(S.of(context).login),
                                onTap: () {
                                    loggedIn
                                        ? Provider.of<UserModel>(context).logout()
                                        : Navigator.pushNamed(context, "/login");
                                },
                            ),
                            SizedBox(
                                height: 20,
                            ),
                            ExpansionTile(
                                initiallyExpanded: true,
                                title: Text(
                                    S.of(context).byCategory.toUpperCase(),
                                    style: TextStyle(
                                        fontSize: 14,
                                        fontWeight: FontWeight.w600,
                                        color: Theme.of(context)
                                        .accentColor
                                        .withOpacity(0.5),
                                    ),
                                ),
                                children: showCategories(),
                            ),
                        ],
                    ),
                )
            ],
        ),
    ),
),

Dart Theme Setting

New release 1.2 also supports Dart theme setting, thanks to Flutter bring the best theming built in. To change the background or customize your own colors, just simply open the lib/common/styles.dart and change buildLightTheme or buildDartTheme functions.

Wordpress Blog Layout

Sometimes, your e-commerce app needs to share more information via the Blog and post a new announcement.

Wordpress Blog

ðŸ’  To add a new Blog section to the homepage, open the lib/common/config.json and add below section.

ðŸ’  To customize the Blog list screen, open lib/screens/blogs.dart.
